00107   //  =====================  constants  ===============================

00109   //   ANY_RES should be used in selection functions for specifying
00110   // "any residue" to select. Defined in mmdb_selmngr.cpp
00111   extern const int ANY_RES;
00112 
00113   //    PRNK_XXXXX are the print keys. PRNK_Silent supresses all print
00114   // inside mmdb_xxxx unless specifically ordered or catastrophic.
00115   // PRNK_SimRWBROOK instructs mmdb to issue, whenever possible and
00116   // necessary, printouts and warnings of RWBROOK (fortran) package.
00117   enum PRINT_KEY  {
00118     PRNK_Silent      = 0,
00119     PRNK_SimRWBROOK  = 1
00120   };
00121 
00122   //  Error_XXXX may be returned by XX::ConvertPDBString() and GetCIF(..)
00123   // functions.
00124   //  Error_WrongSection is returned if the string passed into function
00125   // does not belong to the corresponding PDB section.
00126 
00127 
00128   enum ERROR_CODE  {
00129 
00130     Error_EmptyCIF     =-1,  
00131 
00132     Error_NoError      = 0,
00133     Error_Ok           = 0,
00134     Error_WrongSection = 1,
00135     Error_WrongChainID = 2,
00136     Error_WrongEntryID = 3,
00137 
00138     //  Error_SEQRES_serNum is returned by CSeqRes::ConvertPDBASCII() if
00139     //  serial numbers of SEQRES records do not increment by 1
00140     Error_SEQRES_serNum = 4,
00141 
00142     //  Error_SEQRES_numRes is returned by CSeqRes::ConvertPDBASCII() if
00143     //  SEQRES records show different number of residues
00144     Error_SEQRES_numRes = 5,
00145 
00146     //  Error_SEQRES_extraRes is returned by CSeqRes::ConvertPDBASCII() if
00147     //  SEQRES contains more residues than specified
00148     Error_SEQRES_extraRes = 6,
00149 
00150     Error_NCSM_Unrecognized   = 7,
00151     Error_NCSM_AlreadySet     = 8,
00152     Error_NCSM_WrongSerial    = 9,
00153     Error_NCSM_UnmatchIG      = 10,
00154 
00155     Error_ATOM_Unrecognized   = 11,
00156     Error_ATOM_AlreadySet     = 12,
00157     Error_ATOM_NoResidue      = 13,
00158     Error_ATOM_Unmatch        = 14,
00159 
00160     Error_CantOpenFile        = 15,
00161     Error_UnrecognizedInteger = 16,
00162     Error_WrongModelNo        = 17,
00163     Error_DuplicatedModel     = 18,
00164     Error_NoModel             = 19,
00165     Error_ForeignFile         = 20,
00166     Error_WrongEdition        = 21,
00167 
00168     //  CIF specific
00169     Error_NotACIFFile         = 22,
00170     Error_NoData              = 23,
00171     Error_NoLoop              = 24,
00172     Error_NoStruct            = 25,
00173     Error_UnrecognCIFItems    = 26,
00174     Error_MissingCIFField     = 27,
00175     Error_EmptyCIFLoop        = 28,
00176     Error_EmptyCIFStruct      = 29,
00177     Error_UnexpEndOfCIF       = 30,
00178     Error_MissgCIFLoopField   = 31,
00179     Error_NotACIFStructure    = 32,
00180     Error_NotACIFLoop         = 33,
00181     Error_UnrecognizedReal    = 34,
00182 
00183     Error_NoSheetID           = 35,
00184     Error_WrongSheetID        = 36,
00185     Error_WrongStrandNo       = 37,
00186 
00187     //   Error_WrongNumberOfStrands may be issued when reading
00188     // sheet data from CIF
00189     Error_WrongNumberOfStrands = 38,
00190 
00191     //   Error_WrongSheetOrder may be issued when reading
00192     // sheet data from CIF
00193     Error_WrongSheetOrder      = 39,
00194 
00195     //   Error_HBondInconsistency may be issued when reading
00196     // sheet data from CIF
00197     Error_HBondInconsistency   = 40,
00198 
00199     //   Error_EmptyResidueName is issued when PDB ATOM record
00200     // does not have a residue name
00201     Error_EmptyResidueName     = 41,
00202 
00203     //   Error_DuplicateSeqNum is issued when PDB ATOM records
00204     // show the sequence number and insertion code assigned
00205     // to more than one residue name
00206     Error_DuplicateSeqNum      = 42,
00207 
00208     //   Error_NoLogicalName may be returned by file i/o functions
00209     // if the specified environmental variable for file name
00210     // is not found.
00211     Error_NoLogicalName        = 43,
00212 
00213     //   Error_EmptyFile may be returned at reading non-existing
00214     // coordinate files
00215     Error_EmptyFile            = 44,
00216 
00217     Error_Unknown              = 45,
00218 
00219     //   Error_CIF_EmptyRow is the event of encountering
00220     // an empty row in _atom_site loop. It is handled
00221     // internally and has no effect on API
00222     Error_CIF_EmptyRow      = 99999,
00223 
00224     Error_GeneralError1     = 10000
00225 
00226   };

00228   //  ClassID_XXXX are used by container classes for proper
00229   // creating containered classes when reading from binary file.
00230
